MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://pad.asp-software.org

English.Keywords: windows automation, task scheduler, job scheduler, automate repetitive tasks, automation software, windows scheduler, automation tools, scheduling software, scheduled tasks, windows 7 task scheduler, job scheduling software
English.Char_Desc_80: Customizable Windows Task Scheduling & Automation Made Easy
English.Char_Desc_250: Cacadu is a Windows application that allows automation of Windows tasks by letting the users define Tasks, Actions and Triggers.
English.Char_Desc_450: Every computer user knows there are programs they need to run every time they log into the computer or tasks which need run periodically. Cacadu is the application for you. With Cacadu's simple & customizable user interface you can easily automate the tasks that will make your computer experience more gratifying. Configure applications to start with every login, or run on a periodic basis and do so with more flexibility than Windows offers.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
Creating, editing, and managing your Windows Automation tasks has never been simpler customizable, and powerful that with Conderella's Cacadu Windows Task Scheduler. Running on top of the .NET 4.x framework, this application provides a simple user interface that allows for quick creation of automated tasks to suit your needs.
Get your desktop set up just right by launching all your word processor, browser, and key applications upon logging in. Are you an IT professional or systems administrator? Need more power? Cacadu can do more - much more. Cacadu is fully capable of sourcing in either local or global variables which can be used to control the flow of actions with a single task or all tasks. Cacadu allows you to edit the task properties for additional customization. Graphically & edit view the associated actions for a task and group the tasks for better task management. Define responses to errors for alerts, number of retries, ignore & continue, or quit. Cacadu logs task execution history and errors for troubleshooting purposes. Cacadu gives the user the ability to build truly modular and customized tasks to meet their needs.
So whether you are looking to automate the upload of data files offsite, launch & auto-configure a virtual machine, extend or wrap additional functionality into freeware utilities that have no built-in task scheduling, Cacadu will prove itself scalable. After the 14-day trial and purchase, you will have a 30-day money back guarantee followed by one year of free product updates and technical support. Additionally, the application itself is well documented and online chat is available for support along with the ability to open support tickets. With all the added value provided in the purchase of this Windows Automation application, your needs will be satisfied. Download the application now and extend the power of your computer.
